title: zekoroger
author: zekoroger
content: Want to buy Nintendo Wii with Balance Boar and game for it, if you have for sale, let me know.Thanks

comments.author: tread93
comments.body: The Nintendo Wii was ahead of its time, honestly it should still be around and still be popular. Wii Tennis was the shit. Same with Wii Golf and Wii Baseball. That is all.
